name: ideas-as-a-service
description: A modern web application for turning business ideas into market-ready businesses

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint || true
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/build backend/dist
